lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: This looks like a really big jump Snorlie.

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: I don't think I can make it.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: You can press W twice to do a double jump.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Just make sure to time your second jump right so you can make it as far as possible.

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: I love being in this fictional, unrealistic world.
